title: Hanging, "First Snow", 1955–75
medium:
Medium: cotton warp, wool weft
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
inscribed: Hanging cardboard tag handwritten, "RUG/TAPESTRY 'FIRST SNOW' TRUDE GUERMONPREZ."
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Rectangular hanging showing stripes in  browns and grays, with supplementary off-white pattern of stacked rectangles.
